abstract: National Grid‘s chief executive, Steve Holliday, said Thursday he is optimistic the utility conglomerate’s $7.3 billion takeover of KeySpan will finally close this month.
lead_paragraph: National Grid‘s chief executive, Steve Holliday, said Thursday he is optimistic the utility conglomerate’s $7.3 billion takeover of KeySpan will finally close this month.

headline.main: National Grid Close to Wrapping Up KeySpan Deal
